key_ring_name.description: The name of the KMS Key Ring where this key will be created.

crypto_key_name.description: The name of the KMS crypto key.

crypto_key_purpose.description: The immutable purpose of this CryptoKey.

crypto_key_rotation_period.description: The rotation period has the format of a decimal number with up to 9 fractional digits, followed by the letter s (seconds). It must be greater than a day (ie, 86400).

crypto_key_algorithm.description: The algorithm of the Crypto Key Version

protection_level.description: Protection level determines how cryptographic operations are performed.

role.description: Role that should be assigned to the identities.

members.description: List of identities that will be granted access to the resource.
